progressive-webvr.name: Progressive Enhancement with WebVR.
progressive-webvr.description: Arturo Paracuellos, the creator of Puzzle Rain and other notable WebVR experiences, runs us through how he made a WebVR experience for weather.com that progressively enhances from mobile phones all the way up to full VR systems like the HTC VIVE.
progressive-webvr.author: Arturo Paracuellos
